title: Slime Clicker
description: Slime Clicker is the ultimate clicker game where you make the slime multiply by clicking and buy upgrades to increase the rate of slime production. Unlock achievements, complete quests, and discover new types of slimes and environments to make a perfect cool-looking combo. Unlock all possible slimes and get billions of slime. Unlock achievements and be the best slime farmer. Feed your slime to make him happy to produce even more slime. You can also use the rebirth button to start the game over with an epic permanent slime bonus.
